subject: RE: [junit] Grouping tests
msgSnippet: Have you looked into TestSuitesin 4.5 or the Suite annotation in the latest version? 4.5: http://junit.org/junit/javadoc/4.5/junit/framework/TestSuite.html
messageBody:
Have you looked into TestSuitesin 4.5 or the Suite annotation in the
latest version?

4.5: http://junit.org/junit/javadoc/4.5/junit/framework/TestSuite.html



Latest:
http://junit.sourceforge.net/javadoc/org/junit/runners/Suite.html



From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
Srivalli Arkalgud
Sent: Friday, September 04, 2009 11:23 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Grouping tests





Hello,

How can tests be grouped in JUnit? I am for grouping tests based on test
coverage as in Sanity tests, Smoke tests, Regression tests.

Thanks!
